titles.title: A bill to amend section 118(a) of title 28, United States Code, to require that district court shall be held at Pottsville, Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 3/8/1988--Introduced. Provides that the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania shall be held in Pottsville, Pennsylvania, in addition to those places currently provided by law.
